item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a Salesforce Certified Technical Architect working in Accenture Japan. Over the years I’ve committed the clients’ digital transformation for sectors like Financial Service, Retail, Utility, Telecommunication, Manufacturing, and so on. Expertise in general enterprise integration and customer service. I like two things the most, helping people and solving problems! I’ve learned a lot from you and trailblazer community, so I’m always looking for chances to giving back to the community😉

You Can Also Find Me at

  • Trailblazer Community
  • Twitter
  • Qiita
  • SpeakerDeck
  • GitHub

item.title: Library
item.description:
資料の内容やデモに関するお問い合わせはお気軽に @shunkosa または shun at fastmail.com までご連絡ください。Feel free to ping me at X(Twitter) or email if you want to know details of the following contents.

Presentations

2023

  • はじめよう Salesforce Well-Architected at Dreamforce 2023 Global Gathering Tokyo
  • セキュリティを高めるApex最新機能とコード品質を高める開発プロセス at Salesforce World Tour Tokyo 2021/07
    • See also Apex でユーザモードでデータベースを操作する
  • Client Credentials OAuthフローと新しいライセンスで始めるシンプルなAPI連携

2022

  • Foodforceで世界のTrailblazersと繋がろう
  • コマンド一回でデータ移行！SFDMU プラグインを試そう

2021

  • sfdx-git-deltaで差分デプロイを自動化する
  • 法人番号検索する画面ノーコードで作れちゃう説 at Umekitaforce 2021/07
